xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/842771-But Words Do Hurt: Stories From GLBTT Youth 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null GLBTT youth from Alberta talk about their identities, coming out, family, the media, and their experiences in school and their dreams and hopes for the future. Professionals from a wide-variety of backgrounds (police officers, social workers, lawyers, and teachers) also discuss why it is important to address GLBTT issues in schools. But Words Do Hurt: Stories From GLBTT Youth
